items.title: India looks at ‘pink hydrogen’ even as green hydrogen mission struggles to keep pace
items.description: The central government is toying with the idea of scaling up 'pink hydrogen'—hydrogen produced through nuclear power—in industries as part of its long-term plan for India to achieve net zero emissions by 2070.

items.title: Coal production rises by a modest 3.63 percent in April to cross 81 million tonne
items.description: Production from captive and commercial mines in April stood at 14.51 MT, a 26.6 percent rise from 11.46 MT seen in April 2024.

items.title: Oyo to foray into F&B business through in-house kitchens, QSR across company-serviced hotels
items.description: OYO said it will offer guests at its hotels in-house kitchen services, to order meals via online platforms, including OTAs and the official app.

items.title: Carlyle launches up to $308 million block deal eyeing exit from PNB Housing Finance
items.description: The March quarter profit for PNB Housing advanced 25 percent to Rs 550 crore. It had posted a net profit of Rs 439 crore in the same quarter a year earlier.
